footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover what Ayahuasca is, its benefits, and how this ancestral medicine can guide you towards profound healing and self-knowledge.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guides who will accompany you. Their wisdom and experience ensure a safe and trusting environment for your transformation.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a transformative experience. Learn about the diet, meditation, and intention for your journey.
contactCommunityText: Become part of our community and stay informed about future ceremonies and events. Follow us on our social networks and contact us for more information.
authRequiredDescription: To see the details of this ceremony, please sign in or create an account.
ayahuascaInfoTitle: A Journey to the Heart of Consciousness
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral medicine from the Amazon, a sacred decoction of two plants: the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub. Together, they create a powerful brew that opens the doors of perception, allowing for deep introspection and spiritual healing. It is considered a teacher that instructs, purifies, and reconnects the individual with their essence and the universe.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: On a biochemical level, Ayahuasca combines a monoamine oxidase inhibitor (MAOI) from the vine with dimethyltryptamine (DMT) from the leaves. This synergy allows DMT, a potent psychoactive compound similar to serotonin, to be orally active and reach the brain. The result is a visionary experience that can last several hours, where deep memories, emotions, and understandings emerge from the subconscious.
spiritualMasterDescription: Beyond chemistry, Ayahuasca is revered as a living intelligence, a spirit of nature that guides the participant on a journey of self-discovery. It facilitates the confrontation of fears and traumas, the dissolution of negative patterns, and the attainment of clarity about one's life purpose. It is a tool for healing emotional wounds, expanding consciousness, and strengthening spiritual connection.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and path. Ayahuasca often reveals deep insights that dispel confusion and bring a sense of purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release deep-seated traumas, fears, and emotional blockages. The ceremony provides a safe space to process and heal past wounds, fostering forgiveness and self-acceptance.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep sense of connection with yourself, others, and the universe. Many describe a feeling of unity and unconditional love that transforms their worldview.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the healing energy in a supportive and trusting environment. Group ceremonies foster a sense of community and shared experience.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies tailored to your specific needs and intentions.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the hearts and souls who will guide you on your healing journey. Each of our guides brings deep wisdom, experience, and an unwavering commitment to your well-being.
guide_desc_wilson: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Conscious preparation is the first step toward a transformative ceremony. This guide will help you align your body, mind, and spirit to receive the medicine.
preparationProcessTitle: The Process: Before, During, and After
preparationProcessDescription: From the initial diet to the final integration, each phase is crucial. Understanding the process will give you confidence and allow you to fully surrender to the experience.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where music, silence, and guidance come together to facilitate your inner journey. Trust, breathe, and surrender.
experienceProcessDescription: Every journey is unique. You might experience visions, intense emotions, or profound peace. The key is openness and acceptance.
integrationProcessDescription: True transformation occurs by applying the teachings in your daily life. We support you in this crucial post-ceremony process.
dietSubtitle: Cleansing your body is essential for a clear connection with the medicine. We recommend following this diet for at least 3-5 days before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Whole grains (rice, quinoa)
• Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
• Grilled or steamed white fish
• Skinless chicken, grilled or boiled
• Water and herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red and processed meats
• Fried or processed food
• Dairy and derivatives
• Refined sugars and spicy food
• Caffeine and alcohol
• Citrus (orange, lemon) 24h before
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental state and intention are the compass for your journey. Dedicate time to introspection before the ceremony.
meditationDescription: Calm your mind and reduce mental noise. Daily meditation, even for 10 minutes, will help you be more present during the ceremony.
intentionsDescription: What are you looking to heal, understand, or release? Define clear but flexible intentions. For example: 'I wish to understand my anxiety' or 'I want to open my heart'.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes. This process of self-reflection will help you clarify your intentions and process the experience afterward.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can be an intense emotional journey. Prepare to face and release repressed emotions such as sadness, anger, or fear. Trust the process and the wisdom of the medicine to guide you. Allow yourself to be vulnerable in a safe and contained space. Emotional release is a fundamental part of the deep healing that Ayahuasca offers.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and a smooth experience.
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers)
• Blanket and pillow or cushion
• Yoga mat or similar
• Personal water bottle
essentialsList:
• A journal and pen
• Tissues or a small towel
• A personal item or amulet (optional)
• Open mind and heart

chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your Spiritual Guide. I am here to answer your questions about the medicine, the ceremonies, and your healing path. How can I help you today?

coursesDescription: These videos will help you deepen your preparation and better understand the experience that awaits you.

backupSubtitle: Manage application data backup and restoration.
exportDataDescription: Create a full backup of all important data (ceremonies, users, content, etc.) into a single JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON backup file. This action will overwrite all existing data.
importSuccessDescription: Data has been restored. The page will now reload.
importWarningDescription: You are about to overwrite ALL application data with the contents of the file. This action will create an automatic backup of the current state before importing.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can restore to that state if needed.
rollbackSuccessDescription: Data has been restored to the state before the last import.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will overwrite the current data with the backup created before the last import. Are you sure?

deleteAllLogsConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete ALL error logs. It cannot be undone.
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
themeCustomizationDescription: Adjust the application's colors for light and dark modes, or choose a predefined theme. Changes will be applied in real-time.
